about_the_game:
Become the Wheelchair! This hilariously challenging physics platformer dares you to master the art of wheelchair movement.

  • Dual-Hand Controls:

    Take on the challenge with a unique dual-handed control system that tests your left- and right-hand coordination to the limit. Push, pull, and pivot your way through every obstacle!

  • Realistic Wheelchair Mechanics:

    Grounded, physics-based controls capture the nuances of wheelchair movement. Play in either third- or first-person view, where even the smallest gap or bump can feel like an impossible challenge.

  • Hand-Crafted Levels and Hidden Paths:

    Navigate creatively designed levels filled with both wacky and relatable obstacles inspired by everyday experiences in a wheelchair. Discover alternate routes and supporting items to find innovative ways to overcome each course.

  • Charmingly Absurd Yet Insightful:

    By transforming something seemingly ordinary into a chaotic, joyful challenge, Wheelchair Simulator offers a fresh perspective on movement and mobility.

Disclaimer

Wheelchair Simulator is designed with respect and appreciation for the experiences of wheelchair users, aiming to bring a unique perspective to platform gaming.

The game combines humor and challenging physics-based gameplay to offer a fresh take on movement mechanics, encouraging empathy and understanding. While the game presents exaggerated obstacles and playful failures, it does so with the intention of celebrating resilience and the creativity required to navigate everyday environments.

We hope players find it thought-provoking and fun at the same time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2nd or 3rd generation, 2.0 GHz or higher) or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 or newer with 2GB VRAM
